content:
ContractFailureKind Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of contract that failed.

In this Article

public enum ContractFailureKind
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ContractFailureKind

Remarks

The ContractFailureKind enumeration is used by the System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs class.

Fields

Assert

An stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.Assert* contract failed.
Assume

An stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.Assume* contract failed.
Invariant

An stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.Invariant* contract failed.
Postcondition

An stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.Ensures* contract failed.
PostconditionOnException

An stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.EnsuresOnThrow* contract failed.
Precondition

A stem.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract.Requires* contract failed.
